charges.charge_description: 8:1326A.F REENTRY OF DEPORTED ALIENS. Penalty: 20 yrs. $250,000 fine. 3 yrs SRT. (1)

Deft a native and citizen of the Federal Republic of Nigeria who falsely and willfully represented himself to be a citizen of the United States. A native and citizen of the Federal Republic of Nigeria who knowingly possessed the State of Michigan birth certificate of another. A native and citizen of the Federal Republic of Nigeria who willfully and knowingly possessed a fradulently obtained Federal Republic of Nigeria passport. A native and citizen of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, and an alien who had been previously ordered deported from the United States after having been convicted of an aggravated felony, and who did self deport himself, did attempt to enter the United States at Houston, Texas the said Deft having not obtained the consent of the Attorney General of the United States for application by the Deft for readmission into the United States in violation of 18 USC 911, 1423, 1544, 1546 and 8 USC 1326(a), 1326(b)(2); [4:02-m-125]
